rooms.name: Open Plan Living & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining living room and kitchen. Features an open concept design with ample natural light from large windows along the eastern side (Vastu compliant) to promote harmony, and bohemian decor such as reclaimed wood finishes, eclectic artwork, and vintage elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom located on the south side of the apartment, designed with bohemian decor using vibrant colors and textures. Includes a built-in wardrobe and natural light from windows oriented in the north-west direction to balance energy according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A versatile space adjacent to the living area that doubles as a dining room. Features a reclaimed wooden table with eclectic seating and decor that complements the bohemian style.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: An inviting entrance featuring an arched doorway and decorative elements inspired by Bohemian aesthetics. Positioned on the north side to harness positive energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A wide balcony extending from the living area offering direct access to the large garden. Decorated with hanging plants and bohemian-style railings to create a relaxing outdoor space.
